para.para: Steps to update your cloud environment to use your own Vertica license to replace the default one offered.

sidebar.para: A Vertica license is included in &kw-hos; for you to use. If you have your own license and wish to update your cloud environment to use your own license, these steps will show you how to.

sidebar.title: Updating the Vertica license key
sidebar.para: Use the following steps to update the Vertica license key in your environment.
